title: Architects of England
brief_description: A study of the work of English architects from the eleventh century until the present day, with reference to the kind of material and designs used and adapted for English needs, and the work of Inigo Jones and Christopher Wren.
description: A study of the work of English architects from the eleventh century until the present day, with reference to the kind of material and designs used and adapted for English needs, and the work of Inigo Jones and Christopher Wren.
